meanings.definition: Occurring or appearing every two weeks.
meanings.sent1: My biweeklies haircut appointment is on Friday.
meanings.sent2: The biweeklies staff meeting is scheduled for next Monday.
meanings.sent3: I always feel like a biweeklies celebrity after my haircut.
meanings.sent4: The biweeklies rhythm of the changing seasons is comforting.
meanings.sent5: The biweeklies schedule keeps me organized and on track.

meanings.definition: Publications that are issued every two weeks.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the biweeklies magazine for the latest news.
meanings.sent2: The biweeklies newspaper always arrives on Thursdays.
meanings.sent3: The biweeklies publication is my favorite source of recipes.
meanings.sent4: The biweeklies journal is a treasure trove of information.
meanings.sent5: The biweeklies newsletter keeps me informed about local events.
